basic.description: This course covers statistical techniques commonly employed in financial studies. Students examine actual applications within a variety of financial studies in order to learn how to conduct statistical tests and interpret their results, and also familiarize themselves with WRDS and a variety of databases in order to learn how to conduct research.
basic.subject: FIN
basic.title: Applied Econometrics in Finance

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: FIN 4504 or FIN 4424 or equivalent.
